---
title: "Version History"
---

This page contains a detailed description of how the Nested RF Protocols have evolved over time. It includes detailed descriptions of the contents of the different protocol versions, a timeline of changes and tabular comparisons of the different parameters used in each version.

## Descriptions of Protocol 1 Versions

#### P1 protocol (Dec 2024 - January 2025) - RNAi experiments

- Area of arena presented: Left half of the arena screen (LHS). 17:112 pixels in x (width) and 1:48 pixels in y (height). [96 x 48 pixels area]
- Background intensity: (6/15) - gs_val = 4.
- Number of repetitions: 4
- Flash sizes: 12 x 12 pixels and 6 x 6 pixels
- Flash contrasts: both ON (15/15) and OFF (0/15)
- Flash duration: 200ms
- Flash overlap: 0% (non-overlapping grid)
- Interval between flashes: 50ms
- Location: `protocols/LHS` within the `nested_RF_stimulus` GitHub repository.
- Protocol: `protocol1_10kHz_4reps_12px_6px_LHS_2sbkg_200msfl_50msint_12-13-24_14-33-03`

::: {.callout-note}
### Results file:
"Spring2025_RNAi_Protocol2_Analysis". Data: 2024_12_12 to 2025_01_23. See the file "RNAi_exp_log".
:::

## Parameter Overview 

### Protocol 1 Parameter Comparison

Side-by-side comparison of all Protocol 1 versions, highlighting the key parameter differences.

| Parameter | Early Testing | RNAi (Dec-Jan) | DS (Apr-May) | T4/T5 (Jul-Nov) | Pharmacology (Nov-Dec) |
|:----------|:--------------|:---------------|:--------------|:----------------|:-----------------------|
| **Date range** | Nov 27 - Dec 12, 2024 | Dec 13, 2024 - Jan 23, 2025 | Apr 8 - May 9, 2025 | Jul 10 - Nov 2025 | Nov 14 - Dec 2025 |
| **Screen side** | LHS | LHS | RHS | LHS | LHS |
| **Pixel range (x)** | 17:112 | 17:112 | 97:196/81:180 | 17:112 | 17:112 |
| **Flash sizes** | 12px + 6px | 12px + 6px | 12px + 6px | 12px + 6px | 6px only |
| **Flash duration** | 200ms | 200ms | 200ms | 200ms | 200ms |
| **Inter-flash interval** | 50ms | 50ms | 50ms | 150ms | 150ms |
| **Background intensity** | gs_val=4 (6/15) | gs_val=4 (6/15) | gs_val=4 (6/15) | gs_val=4 (4/15) | gs_val=4 (4/15) |
| **Flash contrasts** | ON + OFF | ON + OFF | ON + OFF | ON + OFF | ON + OFF |
| **Repetitions** | 4 | 4 | 4 | 4 | 4 |
| **Sampling rate** | 20 kHz | 10 kHz | 10 kHz | 10 kHz | 10 kHz |
: {.bordered}

::: {.callout-important}
#### Key Protocol 1 Changes Over Time

1. **Dec 2024:** Changed from 20kHz to 10kHz sampling rate
2. **Apr 2025:** Switched from LHS to RHS for DS Probe experiments
3. **Jul 2025:** Increased inter-flash interval from 50ms to 150ms; changed background from 6/15 to 4/15
4. **Nov 2025:** Removed 12px flashes for pharmacology experiments (6px only)
:::

## Descriptions of Protocol 2 Versions

#### P2 protocol (Dec 2024 - Jan 2025) - RNAi experiments

- Area of arena presented: [30 x 30 pixel area]
- Background intensity: (6/15) - gs_val = 4.
- Number of repetitions: 3
- Only ONE contrast - either ON (15/15) or OFF (0/15)
- Square flashes presented on 50% overlapping grid.

Sequence of stimuli in the protocol:

- 4 pixel square flashes - 160ms duration - 340ms interval
- 4 pixel square flashes - 80ms duration - 170ms interval
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 28 dps
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 56 dps

::: {.callout-note}
### Results file:
"Spring2025_RNAi_Protocol2_Analysis". Data: 2024_12_12 to 2025_01_23. See the file "RNAi_exp_log".
:::

#### P2 protocol (July 2025 - Sep 2025) - T4/T5 experiments - SUMMER

- Area of arena presented: [30 x 30 pixel area]
The 6 x 6 pixel flashes are presented in a 33 x 33 pixel square area - larger than the 30 x 30 pixel square area for the 4 x 4 pixel flashes - to get an even number of flashes on a 50% overlapping grid.
- Background intensity: (4/15) - gs_val = 4.
- Number of repetitions: 3
- Only ONE contrast - either ON (15/15) or OFF (0/15)
- Square flashes presented on 50% overlapping grid.
- 1s interval between each bar sweep

Sequence of stimuli in the protocol:

- 10s background at the start and between repetitions
- 4 pixel square flashes - 160ms duration - 440ms interval
- 6 pixel square flashes - 160ms duration - 440ms interval
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 28 dps
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 56 dps

::: {.callout-note}
### Results file:
"Summer2025_MARCM_p2_analysis". Data: 2025_07_12 to 2025_09_12
:::

_______________________________

#### P2 protocol (Oct 2025 - Nov 2025) - T4/T5 experiments - AUTUMN

- Area of arena presented: [30 x 30 pixel area]
The 6 x 6 pixel flashes are presented in a 33 x 33 pixel square area - larger than the 30 x 30 pixel square area for the 4 x 4 pixel flashes - to get an even number of flashes on a 50% overlapping grid.
- Background intensity: (4/15) - gs_val = 4.
- Number of repetitions: 3
- Only ONE contrast - either ON (15/15) or OFF (0/15)
- Square flashes presented on 50% overlapping grid.
- 1s interval between each bar sweep

Sequence of stimuli in the protocol:

- 10s background at the start and between repetitions
- 3s background interval between square flashes and sweeps, between sweep speeds and between bar flash speeds. (Added 2025_10_21).
- 4 pixel square flashes - 160ms duration - 440ms interval
- 6 pixel square flashes - 160ms duration - 440ms interval
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 28 dps
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 56 dps
- **4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 168 dps**
- **4 pixel wide bar flashes - 80ms duration - 920ms interval**
- **4 pixel wide bar flashes - 14ms duration - 486ms interval**

The bar flashes are presented in different random orders for each repetition.
The bar flash stimuli contains 11 different positions.
From 2025_10_15 - 2025_10_23, the "central" bar flash is positioned in the middle of the 30 x 30 pixel area, then the 5 positions either side are this bar moved by 1 pixel increments and decrements from this position in the 8 different orientations.
From 2024_10_23 onwards, these 5 other positions are the central bar moved by 2 pixel increments and decrements.

::: {.callout-important}
### Changed the full field bar stimuli 00015 and 00016
Remade 0015 and 0016 full field bar stimuli - corresponds to dark bars 6/8pi and 7/8pi - so that their "normal" and "flipped" directions match the sequence of the other bar orientations. Before they were moving from west to east, but now changed so that they're moving from east to west. 
:::


::: {.callout-note}
### Results file:
"Autumn2025_MARCM_p2_analysis". Data: 2025_10_15 to 2025_11_17
:::

_______________________________

#### P2 protocol (Nov 2025 - Dec 2025) - T4/T5 pharmacology experiments

- Area of arena presented: [30 x 30 pixel area]
- Background intensity: (4/15) - gs_val = 4.
- Number of repetitions: 3
- Only ONE contrast - either ON (15/15) or OFF (0/15)
- 1s interval between each bar sweep
- NO SQUARE PIXEL FLASHES PRESENTED IN P2.

Sequence of stimuli in the protocol:

- 10s background at the start and between repetitions
- 3s background interval between sweep speeds and between bar flash speeds.
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 28 dps
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 56 dps
- 4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 168 dps
- **4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 250 dps**
- **4 pixel wide bar sweeps - 500 dps**
- 4 pixel wide bar flashes - 80ms duration - 920ms interval
- 4 pixel wide bar flashes - 14ms duration - 486ms interval

There are 88 bar flash stimuli. 8 different orientations. Bar centred on the 30 x 30 pixel square and then moved by 2 pixel steps in either direction along this axis.

::: {.callout-note}
### Results file:
"Autumn2025_T4T5_Pharma". Data: 2025_11_18 to 2025_12_22
:::

::: {.callout-important}
### 2025-11-20: "Dummy" sweep added
At the beginning of each repetition through the stimuli, the slowest speed starts with one additional right to left sweep. This is then followed by the normal order of sweeps (left to right, then right to left). This extra sweep happens only for the slowest speed, but at the beginning of each rep. 
:::

| Parameter | RNAi | DS Probe | T4/T5 Summer | T4/T5 Autumn | Pharmacology |
|:--------------|:-----|:----|:--------|:---------|:--------|
| **10s background at start** | No | Yes (from May 6) | Yes | Yes | Yes |

| **3s background between stimuli** | No | No | No | Yes (from Oct 21) | Yes |


::: {.callout-important}
#### Key Protocol 2 Changes Over Time

1. **May 6th 2025:** Added 10s background intervals between repetitions amd at the start of the protocol.
2. **July 2025:** Changed the background intensity from 6/15 to 4/15.
3. **Oct 2025:** Added 168 dps sweeps and bar flashes (80ms and 14ms) to the protocol.
4. **Oct 2025:** Introduced a 3s background interval between stimulus blocks for easier data parsing.
5. **Oct 23rd 2025:** Changed bar flash position spacing from 1px to 2px increments.
6. **Nov 2025:** Removed square flashes for pharmacology experiments, focusing solely on bar sweeps and flashes. Added 2 faster speeds. 
:::

::: {.callout-note}
### How to verify the version if unsure
For definitive confirmation, check the metadata within the `.mat` saved within the `params` folder and the `currentExp.mat` file within the experiment folder, which contain the exact parameters used. The exact pattern and position functions used are saved within the experiment folder too.
:::
